attributes.action: Do NOT allow May to become our PM!
attributes.additional_details: Let's get Andrea Leadsom back! Someone who actually cares enough about the British people, unlike May!
attributes.background: NOBODY who wants to legalize pedophilia should have the right to run for PM and she IS breaking our law by trying to allow sharia law into the UK where it is not welcomed!!!

rejection.details:
Under the UK's constitution, the Monarch invites the person who appears most likely to command the confidence of the House of Commons to serve as Prime Minister and form (or continue) a government.

This is usually the leader of the party which has a majority of seats in the House.

The leadership of a political party is a matter for the party concerned, not the Government or Parliament.
